thread.title: School Bus Accident Near Palamaner Leaves Students Injured
thread.title_full: School Bus Accident Near Palamaner Leaves Students Injured

author: Pavan Bandari
title: School Bus Accident Near Palamaner Leaves Students Injured
text:
School Bus Accident Near Palamaner Leaves Students Injured
A serious road accident occurred near Palamaner in the Chittoor district, involving a school bus from the Kinder Care Trust for disabled children. The bus was rear-ended by a lorry while travelling on the Bengaluru-Chennai NH 4 national highway on Wednesday night.
At the time of the incident, eleven students were aboard the bus, which was returning from medical examinations in Bengaluru. Nine students sustained injuries, with four reported in critical condition. The injured students are currently receiving treatment at the Palamaner Government Hospital.
Authorities are investigating the circumstances surrounding the accident.
